text: Mba mbik zav Zisas han zɨgap, ana zɨnkɨrar ana suani piiŋ thɨgap nzi. Ana nzim, anan theerphara Zisas ŋkarveni ga ri. Anan theerphara Zisas ŋkarveni ga regim, ana mbaram won pana rɨgira Zisas ŋkarveni mbɨrgiap, Zisas ŋkarveni suirav, ni viavav, ni khoman mpari. Ana mba tɨvar Zisas ŋkarveni ga muuŋgiap, mbaram mba ndɨgar vhuuŋ hi mporiiŋ siav Zisas ŋkarveni ga suav, mba mporiin ana ŋkarveni hɨvi.
